data.event: It was founded in 1835 by pioneer Presley Saunders.

event.title: was first incorporated as a town by European Americans in 1842

data.event: Mount Pleasant was first incorporated as a town by European Americans in 1842, and again in 1851.

event.title: 1869, Mount Pleasant was the site of a solar eclipse expedition, under the command of James Craig Watson and sponsored

data.event: In 1869, Mount Pleasant was the site of a solar eclipse expedition, under the command of James Craig Watson and sponsored by National Almanac.
The total solar eclipse occurred on August 7, 1869.
In the Union Block building in 1869, Arabella A. Mansfield became the first woman in the United States to be awarded a license to practice law.
